law.catch_line: An insurance company or affiliate may not directly or indirectly:...

text.section:
An insurance company or affiliate may not directly or indirectly:
manage a venture firm;
beneficially own, through rights, options, convertible interests, or otherwise, more than 15% of the voting securities or other voting ownership interest of a venture firm; or
control the direction of investments for a venture firm.
Subsection (a) of this section applies whether or not the insurance company or affiliate is authorized to do business in the State.
